title: Image Comparison
description:
This canvas demonstrates Claude's image comparison capabilities.

        The example shows a simple one-turn conversation where Claude compares
        two insect images (an ant and a bee) and explains their differences.

        This showcases how to use ImageBlockParam with URL sources to send
        multiple images in a single message to Claude for comparison analysis.

message.content: You are a helpful assistant that provides image comparisons. Respond only in English.

These images show two very different insects captured in macro photography, with several distinct differences:

1. Species:
- Image 1 shows an ant, with its characteristic segmented body and long legs
- Image 2 shows a metallic green bee or sweat bee, covered in pollen

2. Color:
- The ant is primarily black/dark colored
- The bee has a brilliant metallic green coloration with golden pollen covering its body

3. Background/Setting:
- The ant is photographed on a plain, beige surface with a soft brown background
- The bee is photographed against a warm orange background, appearing to be on what looks like a flower or plant surface

4. Composition:
- The ant is captured in profile view, showing its full body length
- The bee is captured at a closer angle, focusing more on its upper body and wings

5. Lighting:
- The ant photo has subtle, neutral lighting
- The bee photo has dramatic warm lighting that creates a golden glow effect

Both images are excellent examples of macro insect photography but showcase very different subjects and photographic styles.
